title: Playtime with Pleo, your robotic dinosaur friend
description: Pleo the robot dinosaur acts like a living pet -- exploring, cuddling, playing, reacting and learning. Inventor Caleb Chung talks about Pleo and his wild toy career at EG07, on the week that Pleo shipped to stores for the first time.
author: Caleb Chung
keywords: TED, talks, children, design, dinosaurs, entertainment, happiness, invention, play, technology, toy, Best of the Web
